description.value: Akadala regains 5 hit points whenever she starts her turn and has at least 1 hit point. When Akadala takes damage from a silvered weapon, her regeneration does not function on her next turn.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ weapon

Standard

Requirement: Akadala must be in human or hybrid form.

Attack: Melee 1 (one creature)

+12 vs. AC

Hit: 2d10 + 4 damage, and the target is marked until the end of Akadala's next turn.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ poison

Standard

Requirement: Akadala must be in snake or hybrid form.

Attack: Melee 1 (one creature)

+12 vs. Reflex, or + 14 vs. Reflex if Akadala is grabbing the target.

Hit: 1d8 + 6 damage, and ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends). At the end of the encounter, the target makes a saving throw. On a failure, the target contracts wereserpent blood rot (stage 1).

At-Will

Standard

Requirement: Akadala must be in snake or hybrid form and not be grabbing a creature.

Attack: Melee 1 (one creature)

+12 vs. Reflex

Hit: 1d8 + 6 damage, and the target is grabbed (escape DC 16).

Sustain Minor: The grab persists. The grabbed creature takes 10 damage and becomes dazed until the end of Akadala's next turn.

Miss: Half damage.

At-Will

Move

Requirement: Akadala must be in snake or hybrid form and grabbing a creature.

Effect: Akadala moves up to her speed and the creature she is grabbing moves with her, ending its movement in an unoccupied square adjacent to her.

At-Will

Move

Requirement: Akadala must not be slowed.

Effect: Akadala shifts up to 4 squares. Each ally within 10 squares of Akadala can shift up to 2 squares as a free action.

At-Will ✦ polymorph

Minor

Effect: Akadala alters her physical form to appear as a snake, a Medium unique human, or a hybrid.

At-Will ✦ poison

Triggered

Trigger: An enemy Akadala has marked moves, shifts, or makes an attack that does not include her as a target.

Attack (Immediate Interrupt): Melee 1 (the triggering enemy)

+12 vs. AC

Hit: 1d8 + 6 damage, and the target is weakened and takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends both). Akadaka takes 5 damage.

system.biography:
HP 70; Bloodied 35Init +9
AC 23Fort 21Ref 17Will 19
Speed 6, climb 4 (snake or hybrid form only)
Ability ScoresStr 22 (+9)
Con 16 (+6)		Dex 18 (+7)
Int 11 (+3)		Wis 13 (+4)
Cha 20 (+8)
Languages Common
Alignment Evil
Skills Acrobatics +12, Bluff +13, Stealth +12Senses Low-light vision
Passive Perception 14 | Insight 14

Equipment bastard sword .

Traits

[[/roll 0#<p style="background-color:green;color:white;"> <b>Regeneration</b> <b></b></p><p>Akadala regains 5 hit points whenever she starts her turn and has at least 1 hit point. When Akadala takes damage from a silvered weapon, her regeneration does not function on her next turn.</p>]] Regeneration

Akadala regains 5 hit points whenever she starts her turn and has at least 1 hit point. When Akadala takes damage from a silvered weapon, her regeneration does not function on her next turn.
